title: Aromatherapy Energizing Fragrance Oil
description: Aromatherapy Energizing fragrance oil by Nature's Garden scents is a uplifting scent that is fresh and minty. You will love our wholesale fragrances.
cleaned_text: Top Notes: Fresh Air, Spearmint, Peppermint, Lemon Middle Notes: Garden Fresh Wintergreen, Gardenia, Jasmine Base Notes: Rose, Musk A Top Notes: Fresh Air, Spearmint, Peppermint, Lemon Middle Notes: Garden Fresh Wintergreen, Gardenia, Jasmine Base Notes: Rose, Musk Product Details Our testing notes should never take the place of your own personal testing. Always test fragrance in all applications. We do not take responsibility for our test results differing from your test results. Natures Garden is not responsible for any finished products made with our raw ingredients. Cold process soap testing was done by our staff using strict controls. Stick blenders can help to incorporate fragrance back into the soap in the event that it rices during the mixing process. Soaping at room temperature can help to reduce the likelihood of accelerated trace. Fragrances containing vanilla ingredients may discolor soap. Vanilla White Color stabilizer may help prevent discoloration due to vanilla. However, there are more than 40 ingredients used in fragrance manufacturing that may contribute to discoloration of products PRODUCT REVIEWS What Everyone is Saying Related Products Products You Also Might Love
